description: CryptoZonic lands in Hong Kong for Consensus 2026 bringing together Web3 founders, traders, investors, KOLs, and ecosystem partners for a high-energy after-hours experience Expect music, nightlife culture, and global Web3 communities colliding under the same roof powered by GRVT and MEXC Ventures. With Asia s strongest trading ecosystem, crypto-native culture, and cross-border community this edition of CryptoZonic delivers a night of networking without the suits. Venue: Space Club, Central HK Date: Feb 11, 2026 Time: 10:00PM 03:00AM (GMT 8) Who s attending: Founders & investors Web3 funds & venture teams Traders & KOLs Ecosystem leaders & builders Friends from global communities Please Note Luma approval does not guarantee entry!
